mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USERS (FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, CELL_NUMBER, EMAIL, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, ZIP_CODE, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SALT, STATE) VALUES (#{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt}, 1);
